item.description:
Member Steve Pitney invites us to visit Alternate Energy, Inc., his "solar powered shop", in Plymouth MA. They service all makes and models of solar collector, photovoltaic, and wind systems. At their website - www.DCSolar.Net - you can find descriptions of their projects.

CARPOOLING IS HAPPENING. Can you get to the Braintree T stop? Contact Josh or Nancy for details.

DRIVING CAUTION: Steve writes: "if coming from 495: Most Map Quest will tell you to go through Barker Rd to Concord st, which has been blocked. You need to go down to rte 3 south."

For more information, see http://www.DCSolar.ne...
item.name: Bos. Area Alt. Energy Supporters FIELD TRIP 1 - Alternate Energy, Inc
